mapper.insert:
SELECT IF( EXISTS( SELECT royalty_overdue_code FROM royalty_overdue), concat('royalty_overdue_code', MAX(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(royalty_overdue_code,21), UNSIGNED))+1), 'royalty_overdue_code1') as royaltyOverdueCode FROM royalty_overdue
INSERT INTO royalty_overdue (royalty_overdue_code, contract_code, royalty_overdue_status, royalty_overdue_paid, royalty_overdue_pay_date, royalty_overdue_rest, royalty_total_overdue_pay, royalty_code) VALUES (#{royaltyOverdueCode}, #{contractCode}, (select case when royalty_actual_amount=0 then '1' else '2' END as royaltyActualAmount FROM royalty where royalty_code = #{royaltyCode}), #{royaltyActualAmount}, (select if(isnull(#{royaltyPayActualDate}),null, #{royaltyPayActualDate})) , #{royaltyOverdueRest}, #{headSellProfitBySubMonth}, #{royaltyCode} );
